title: Drawing, "Architectural Fantasy", 1745–50
medium: Brush and gray brown wash, over black chalk on paper
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: In this architectural fantasy, an arched bridge ornamented with a sculptural monument transitions into a grandiose palace, to the left.  The palace, viewed from an oblique angle, has twin porticos.  In the background, a domed and colonnaded building is visible in the distance.  Through the arch of the bridge appear steps, another monument, and number small-scale figures.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Architectural Fantasy", 1745–50.
1745–50. Brush and gray brown wash, over black chalk on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-511.
